summary: Frontend implements automatic polling for the caller profile when status is pending (REQ-5). Backend internalRoles refactor/unified pending query/role-agnostic approval (REQ-1..REQ-3) and superadmin UI removal of a separate Customer Service list (REQ-4) cannot be confirmed from the provided truncated diffs. Additional changes were made to Customer Service-facing views that are not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Customer Service dashboard/summary UI changes (read-only summary cards and dashboard copy) unrelated to unifying the superadmin approval flow.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to merge CUSTOMER_SERVICE approvals into the superadmin internal approval flow and add polling; it does not request changes to Customer Service dashboard/summary pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Customer Service 'User Management (Read-Only)' view changes unrelated to superadmin approval unification.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is superadmin internal approval flow and caller-profile polling; it does not request modifying Customer Service user management UI.
